name: Francisco Cruz
description: She is just too good of a teammate and professional, but she's also growing non-stop, which is really impressive. I would trust her with any development or project management position, her responsibility and communication skills are admirable.

name: Pedro Matarrita Brenes
description: She's one of the more knowledgeable Front End developers I've had the pleasure to work with. If your looking for someone with technical knowledge and leadership qualities I would 100% recommend Erika.
